# advanced(by:)

**Instance Method**

Calculates an operation queue scheduler time by advancing the scheduler time type’s date by the given interval.

## Declaration

```swift
func advanced(by n: OperationQueue.SchedulerTimeType.Stride) -> OperationQueue.SchedulerTimeType
```

## Parameters

- **n**: The time interval to advance [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/OperationQueue/SchedulerTimeType/date] by.

## Return Value

An operation queue scheduler time advanced by the given interval from [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/OperationQueue/SchedulerTimeType/date].

## Managing Scheduler Time Type Properties

- **date**: The date this type represents.
- **distance(to:)**: The distance to another operation queue scheduler time.
- **OperationQueue.SchedulerTimeType.Stride**: The interval by which operation queue times advance.
